Channel.Message: Events from the MPEG-2 Video Encoder MFT

Task.Message: Task done by the video encoder
Task.Name: EncoderTask

Keyword.Message: Events dealing with the control of the encoder.
Keyword.Name: Encoder_Control

Keyword.Message: Events that deal with the processing of samples
Keyword.Name: Sample_Processing

Event.Channel: Events from the MPEG-2 Video Encoder MFT
Event.Task: Task done by the video encoder
Event.Message: Input sample (%2) to stream #%1 submitted to MPEG-2 Video Encoder through the MFT. Flags: %3
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="InputStreamID" inType="win:UInt64" outType="xs:unsignedLong"/> <data name="pSample" inType="win:Pointer" outType="win:HexInt64"/> <data name="dwFlags" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

Event.Channel: Events from the MPEG-2 Video Encoder MFT
Event.Task: Task done by the video encoder
Event.Message: Finished submission of sample to encoder. HR=%1

Event.Channel: Events from the MPEG-2 Video Encoder MFT
Event.Task: Task done by the video encoder
Event.Message: Process event method called on MFT for Input Stream #%1 with event %2
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="InputStreamID" inType="win:UInt64" outType="xs:unsignedLong"/> <data name="pEvent" inType="win:Pointer" outType="win:HexInt64"/> </template>

Event.Channel: Events from the MPEG-2 Video Encoder MFT
Event.Message: Processing of Event by the MFT has finished. HR=%1

Event.Channel: Events from the MPEG-2 Video Encoder MFT
Event.Task: Task done by the video encoder
Event.Message: Message %1 recieved by MFT through ProcessMessage with parameter %2
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="MessageType" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="Param" inType="win:Pointer" outType="win:HexInt64"/> </template>

Event.Channel: Events from the MPEG-2 Video Encoder MFT
Event.Task: Task done by the video encoder
Event.Message: Finished processing message given to MPEG-2 Video Encoder MFT. HR=%1

Event.Channel: Events from the MPEG-2 Video Encoder MFT
Event.Message: Bitrate has been changed from %1 bps to %2 bps during the encoding process.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="OldBitrate" inType="win:UInt64" outType="xs:unsignedLong"/> <data name="NewBitrate" inType="win:UInt64" outType="xs:unsignedLong"/> </template>

Event.Channel: Events from the MPEG-2 Video Encoder MFT
Event.Task: Task done by the video encoder
Event.Message: Start of producing an output sample on the MPEG-2 Video Encoder MFT. Output Buffer Count: %2 Start of Output Buffer Array: %3 Pointer to Output Buffer Status Flag: %4 Output Buffer Flags passed in: %1
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="Flags" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="OutputBufferCount" inType="win:UInt64" outType="xs:unsignedLong"/> <data name="pOutputSamples" inType="win:Pointer" outType="win:HexInt64"/> <data name="pdwStatus" inType="win:Pointer" outType="win:HexInt64"/> </template>

Event.Channel: Events from the MPEG-2 Video Encoder MFT
Event.Task: Task done by the video encoder
Event.Message: Finished creating sample for output on the MPEG-2 Video Encoder MFT. HR=%1

Event.Channel: Events from the MPEG-2 Video Encoder MFT
Event.Task: Task done by the video encoder
Event.Message: Mpeg-2 Video Encoder MFT is Signaling that an output sample (Location: %1, Length: %2) is ready
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="pSample" inType="win:Pointer" outType="win:HexInt64"/> <data name="cSampleLength" inType="win:UInt64" outType="xs:unsignedLong"/> </template>

Event.Channel: Events from the MPEG-2 Video Encoder MFT
Event.Task: Task done by the video encoder
Event.Message: MPEG-2 Video Encoder is requesting for more input samples

Event.Channel: Events from the MPEG-2 Video Encoder MFT
Event.Task: Task done by the video encoder
Event.Message: The MPEG-2 Video Encoder MFT has received the input from the application and is passing it into the encoder. Sample: %1 Sample Byte Length: %2 Stop Encoding: %3
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="pSample" inType="win:Pointer" outType="win:HexInt64"/> <data name="cSampleLength" inType="win:UInt64" outType="xs:unsignedLong"/> <data name="bEndOfEncoding" inType="win:Boolean" outType="xs:boolean"/> </template>

Event.Channel: Events from the MPEG-2 Video Encoder MFT
Event.Message: Encoder is being created with these settings: Coding Mode: %1 Bitrate: %2 bps Complexity: %3 Encoder Instance: %4
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="CodingMode" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="Bitrate" inType="win:UInt64" outType="xs:unsignedLong"/> <data name="Complexity" inType="win:UInt64" outType="xs:unsignedLong"/> <data name="pEncoder" inType="win:Pointer" outType="win:HexInt64"/> </template>
